document.full_text: gunmen sunday shot dead a muslim cleric in northeastern nigeria who was known for giving sermons condemning the actions of an islamic sect responsible for a series of violent attacks in recent months.
document.title: muslim cleric shot dead in northeastern nigeria
lines_and_colors: gunmen sunday shot dead a muslim cleric in northeastern nigeria who was known for giving sermons condemning the actions of an islamic sect responsible for a series of violent attacks in recent months.
